answers.answer: Yes oh my gosh. I get that way almost every day with my family. Friends not so much lol

Sounds bad i kno. & then my bf bought me jus waffles chocolate chip kind , they had there own kind blueberry ,i go to.sign papers for the.doc come home n allll my chocolate chip waffles r gone the whole reason of buying our own.box was for we wouldn't eat theres & they eat allll of mine drives me crrrazyy!! -_-
Oh I would be so pissed off. Although I have that problem with my family but I finally got it under wraps
Blew up at them about the fact that I was pregnant and needed the food and snacks that I bought for myself and to stay out of my stuff and to ask before they just took. It actually worked too
Today is the day. I just want to rip everyone's face off
Is it because were pregnant?? Idk , i dont wana sound alll rude r whatever.. But yea today is that day , even my bf is getting on my nerves -_-

And she's super clingu, nosey, and jealous..she even acts like she's got all the prego symptoms and she 60...lol but I have no backbone so I just fume

Yes, today is that day. I'm sick of everyone's sense of entitlement.
